'''''Funerary Storm''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To obtain this achievement, the player needs to use a {{Pneuma}} attack to remove the [[Icewind Suite]]'s [[RES]] increase and weaken Coppelia's wind pulses of during the performance's climax.

==Gameplay Notes==
* The duo only gain {{Ousia}} energy after Coppelia releases her first wind pulse. {{Pneuma}} attacks prior to that have no effect.
